Content: 58 Division troops organized a full-day adventure training workshop for differently able woman residents in the Equality-based Community Support and Training Centre (ECSAT) in Galle on 28 December 2018 at the 58 Division Headquarters premises in Boossa. The programme was organized on the directions of the General Officer Commanding 58 Division, Major General Sudath Perera responding to a request made by ECSAT authorities for assistance. 20 differently able women participated in the workshop and received training to face challenges and improve confidence. 58 Division Deputy GOC, Senior Officers and members of the ECSAT attended the workshop.
